snippet.title: The Silver Spoon Caper Trailer
snippet.description:
We proudly present an evening's entertainment featuring Harriet Lane, Private Eye. 

The Silver Spoon Caper began life as a face-to-face, large-scale puzzle experience for 2 to 100 players. Studio Cypher has teamed up with The Code and Key Escape Rooms to bring this noir detective mystery to you!

In this roughly hour-long experience, you will solve a variety of brain teasing puzzles and encounter interesting characters as you track down the masterminds of the impending heist!

Find the game at :https://studiocypher.itch.io/the-silver-spoon-caper on August 6th!
